sentences.sContent: The searchlight raked the open ground around the prison.
sentences.sCn: 探照灯在监狱周围的空地上来回扫射。

synos.tran: 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过

phrases.pCn: 迅速大量取得；大量地敛集（钱财）

trans.tranCn: 搜索；用耙子耙；掠过，擦过
trans.tranOther: to move a rake across a surface in order to make the soil level, gather dead leaves etc

trans.tranCn: 耙子；斜度；钱耙；放荡的人，浪子
trans.tranOther: a gardening tool with a row of metal teeth at the end of a long handle, used for making soil level, gathering up dead leaves etc
